metadata.name: Imports Registry Key From an ADS
metadata.comment: Detects the import of a alternate datastream to the registry with regedit.exe.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\regedit.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('regedit.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /i ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.reg'))) AND process.cmd_line rlike ':\[^ \\\\\]' AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -e ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /e ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –e ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —e ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―e ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -a ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /a ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –a ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —a ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―a ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -c ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /c ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –c ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —c ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―c '))))

output.summary: Detects the import of a alternate datastream to the registry with regedit.exe.

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.parent_process.name, process.cmd_line False positive: Unknown References: https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Regedit/, https://gist.github.com/api0cradle/cdd2d0d0ec9abb686f0e89306e277b8f
